rows.label: qst201104_msg0001
rows.name:
Another memo... What's
written on it this time?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0002
rows.name:
Defeat the monsters that inhabit the
following specified locations...

rows.label: qst201104_msg0003
rows.name:
One, the Magno Blant near the
Sternum Arch in Invidia.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0004
rows.name:
One, the Bodom Grebel near
the Underground River Lavi
in Spirit Crucible Elpys.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0005
rows.name:
One, the Cherys Medooz on
the Lud Cloudway in the
Liberalitas Archipelago.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0006
rows.name:
After defeating all the
monsters, come to Nharil
Central Plaza in Superbia.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0007
rows.name:
There you will be able to
regain your memories.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0008
rows.name: A monster hunt this time?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0009
rows.name:
What do they want from us
by making us do this?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0010
rows.name: ...I don't get it.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0011
rows.name:
What do you think, Mikumari?
Are you still willing to
go along with this?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0012
rows.name:
You know, I think this memo
might be a message for me.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0013
rows.name:
And the memories... I think it's
probably about my old memories...

rows.label: qst201104_msg0014
rows.name: What makes you think that?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0015
rows.name: Hmm, it's just a hunch, but...

rows.label: qst201104_msg0016
rows.name:
I feel like the culprit
wants me to do something...
That's the feeling I get.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0017
rows.name:
Look, every time, it's a spear
that comes flying, right? My
weapon is a spear too...

rows.label: qst201104_msg0018
rows.name:
So you're still planning to go
along with this memo, Mikumari?

rows.label: qst201104_msg0019
rows.name:
Yeah. I'll stop if everyone
is against it, but...

rows.label: qst201104_msg0020
rows.name:
I want to know what the
culprit is thinking...

rows.label: qst201104_msg0021
rows.name:
I understand. Let's trust
your intuition, Mikumari.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0022
rows.name:
It says you'll regain your
memories next, so it wouldn't
be bad to go along a bit longer.

rows.label: qst201104_msg0023
rows.name: Then, shall we go?
